item.title: ISO photographer for promo pics
item.author: invalid@example.com (sydkc)
item.dc:creator: sydkc
item.content:encoded:
basically what the title says! there are so many great photographers but i am on a budget and want some photos that include the whole band now that i have one <3

recommendations or plug yourself! ty!

item.title: Photo and Video production
item.author: invalid@example.com (Eli Gardiner)
item.dc:creator: Eli Gardiner
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone, my name is Eli Gardiner. I’m a songwriter and a video producer. I’ve worked with alot of local bands and musicians from full music videos, documentaries and multi camera capture of a show. I also do some basic audio production and photography. Here are a few recent videos I’ve done. Feel free to email me for more info and rates
ebg9@yahoo.com
Or check out my website at:

https://eligardiner.com/gardiner-productions



...

Read more

item.title: Poster/Flyer promo stuff
item.author: invalid@example.com (NoSaint76!)
item.dc:creator: NoSaint76!
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone.

So, long before I moved here from NYC I did a ton of flyers and stuff for alot of the bands on the lower east side. Long story short, I am here now and with getting Cut Rate Clones stuff together I am getting reinspired to do some work at reasonable rates!

I used to get to take some cool pics as well.

Check these out for some samples of all that fun:

item.title: Sabrina R- Photography & Video(coming soon)
item.author: invalid@example.com (SabrinaRose)
item.dc:creator: SabrinaRose
item.content:encoded:
Salutations!
Dropping below a handful of my personal favorite photos, that also are a fair reflection as to the style of concert photos I love taking.
At shows I can often be found in or around the pit, side stage, or climbing anything sturdy to get "the shot. I love action shots & taking photos of 'moshers'/two-steppers!

item.title: Peter M - Art Direction, Graphic Design, Video & Photo

item.dc:creator: PETER M
item.content:encoded:
Hey y’all,

I do art direction, graphic design, video and photo stuff for money. Willing to barter too.

Find me online on Instagram

item.title: I want to write your press release, bio, etc!
item.author: invalid@example.com (brynbattani)
item.dc:creator: brynbattani
item.content:encoded:
In addition to writing songs, I work as a freelance copywriter! I would love to write any sort of web copy related to your music.

I strongly believe that any artist can easily strengthen their promotional assets just by bringing in an outside perspective. If you’re an artist, there’s a strong chance you’re already a great writer, but it’s hard to talk yourself up. It’s the same reason why many artists avoid mixing their own projects—you've already spent so much time with your work, it’s too...

Read more

item.title: Looking for photographer
item.author: invalid@example.com (sunshineparker)
item.dc:creator: sunshineparker
item.content:encoded: My band is looking for some professional photos to rollout with our upcoming album. Anyone worked with someone they like or know someone? This would be paid and not a swap or something.
